imagesetting: Brightness, Contrast, Saturation, Sharpness, AGC, AEC, AWB, Flip, Mirror
motiondetection: 16 motion detection windows can be configured
power: Input: 100-240VAC 50/60 Hz, 0.7A Output: 12VDC, 1.5A Power Consumption: Max.12W

security: 3 level user access with password protection, IP access list, HTTPS encrypted data transmission
audio: Compression: AMR 6.7kbps~12.2kbps, ACC 8kbps~32kbps Supports 2-way audio External microphone input, audio output
